allow: Bash(powershell -Command "if \(Test-Path ''C:\\Users\\muham\\OneDrive\\Desktop\\Devstack\\companyprofile-devstack\\app\\Views\\layout\\main.php''\) { Write-Host ''main.php found'' } else { Write-Host ''main.php not found'' }")

Bash(powershell -Command "
$mainPath = ''C:\\Users\\muham\\OneDrive\\Desktop\\Devstack\\companyprofile-devstack\\app\\Views\\layout\\main.php''
$mainContent = Get-Content $mainPath -Raw
$scriptTag = ''<script src=""""'' + [System.Uri]::EscapeDataString\(''C:\\Users\\muham\\OneDrive\\Desktop\\Devstack\\companyprofile-devstack\\public\\js\\netdata-animations.js''\) + ''""></script>''

# Find position to insert script \(after Performance Scripts comment\)
$pattern = ''<!-- Performance Scripts -->''
$position = $mainContent.IndexOf\($pattern\)

if \($position -gt 0\) {
    # Insert the script tag after the comment
    $newContent = $mainContent.Substring\(0, $position + $pattern.Length\) + $scriptTag + $mainContent.Substring\($position + $pattern.Length\)
    Set-Content $mainPath -Value $newContent
    Write-Host ''Script added to main.php successfully''
} else {
    Write-Host ''Pattern not found in main.php''
}
")

Bash(python -c "
import re
with open\(''app/Views/pages/contact.php'', ''r'', encoding=''utf-8''\) as f:
    content = f.read\(\)
# Replace Google Maps embed with OpenStreetMap
content = re.sub\(r''https://www\\.google\\.com/maps/embed\\?pb=.*?""'', r''https://www.openstreetmap.org/export/embed.html?bbox=107.632745%2C-6.974361%2C40257.08497&layer=mapnik&marker=-6.974361%2C107.632745""'', content\)
# Replace Google Maps link with OpenStreetMap
content = re.sub\(r''https://maps\\.google\\.com/maps\\?q=.*?""'', r''https://www.openstreetmap.org/?mlat=-6.974361&mlon=107.632745#map=15/-6.974361/107.632745""'', content\)
# Replace Google Maps directions with OpenStreetMap
content = re.sub\(r''https://maps\\.google\\.com/maps/dir/\\?api=1&destination=.*?""'', r''https://www.openstreetmap.org/directions/?from=&to=-6.974361,107.632745""'', content\)
with open\(''app/Views/pages/contact.php'', ''w'', encoding=''utf-8''\) as f:
    f.write\(content\)
print\(''Fixed Google Maps to OpenStreetMap''\)
")
